statements: DELETE FROM employee_progress WHERE employee_id = 100 AND progress_status = 'In Progress';
DELETE FROM employee_progress WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date >= '2022-03-31';
DELETE FROM Development_Goal WHERE goal_status = 'In Progress';
DELETE FROM Development_Goal WHERE employee_id = 100 AND goal_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT' AND progress < 50;
DELETE FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE employee_id = 101 AND progress < 50;
